subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Spurs’ last chance to tie Game 5 of the Western Conference Finals — a fall-away 3-point attempt by Manu Ginobili — contrasted sharply with the Thunder’s elevation and athleticism throughout.
snippet: The Spurs’ last chance to tie Game 5 of the Western Conference Finals — a fall-away 3-point attempt by Manu Ginobili — contrasted sharply with the Thunder’s elevation and athleticism throughout.
